name: Triangle of the East
description:
Gangtok, Kalimpong and Darjeeling, popularly called the ‘Triangle of the East’ can also be called as the jewel of the East. A trip to these three places is always associated with enthrallment and amazing views of the picturesque and pristine landscapes.

Originating from Kalimpong, this tour will take you to Gangtok, the capital of Sikkim and finally to Darjeeling, the jewel of Eastern India. While in this tour, you will be visiting most of the prominent landmarks of the three places and get the opportunity to explore the astounding splendour of these places.
